sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An elegy on the Right Reverend Father in God Humphry, Lord Bishop of London, Lord Almoner. Who departed this life the 7th of October, 1675.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for J. Coniers., London, : Anno Domini 1675.
Verse: "Is pious henchman dead, then London, thou ..." Within mourning borders. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======

1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed for J. Coniers., London, : Anno Domini 1675.
Verse: "Is pious henchman dead, then London, thou ..." Within mourning borders. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
J. Coniers.
